app.name: Vauchi
welcome.title: Welcome to Vauchi
welcome.subtitle: Privacy-focused contact cards that update automatically
setup.title: Setup
setup.identity_required: You need to set up an identity to continue.
setup.create_description: Start fresh with a new Vauchi identity
onboarding.welcome_description: Exchange contact info in person. Your data stays yours â€” encrypted, updatable, and private.
onboarding.identity_description: This is how you'll appear to your contacts. You can change it anytime.
onboarding.fields_description: Add your phone, email, or other details. You control who sees what.
onboarding.fields_hint: You can add more fields later in your card settings
onboarding.preview_subtitle: This is how you'll appear to contacts
onboarding.security_e2e_desc: Only you and your contacts can read your data
onboarding.security_local_desc: Your data never leaves your device without your permission
onboarding.security_control_desc: Choose exactly what each contact can see
onboarding.ready_subtitle: Your card is ready to share
onboarding.ready_exchange_desc: Find a friend nearby and scan each other's QR codes
onboarding.ready_customize_desc: Customize your card with more contact details
onboarding.security_description: Only you and your contacts can see your information. Not even us.
home.no_fields: No fields yet. Press 'a' to add contact info!
home.delete_field_confirm: Delete this field? This cannot be undone.
contacts.title: Contacts
contacts.empty: No contacts yet. Exchange cards to add contacts!
contacts.search_active: Search (type to search, Esc to exit)
contacts.name: Name
contacts.verify_instructions: Compare these fingerprints with {name} in person to verify their identity.
contacts.verify_warning: Only mark as verified if you have confirmed these fingerprints match the ones shown on their device.
contacts.no_card_fields: You haven't added any fields to your card yet.
exchange.title: Exchange
exchange.instruction: Share this QR code with others to exchange contact cards. Press 'r' to refresh.
exchange.expired: QR expired! Press 'r' to generate a new one
exchange.expired_hint:
QR code has expired

Press 'r' to generate a new one
exchange.paste_instruction: Paste the exchange data from another user
exchange.camera_permission: Camera permission is required to scan QR codes
settings.title: Settings
settings.appearance_description: Customize the look and language of the app.
settings.local_encrypted: Your identity is stored locally and encrypted.
settings.relay_help: URL must start with wss:// (or ws:// for local dev)
settings.accessibility_description: Customize the app for your accessibility needs.
settings.error_invalid_relay_url: URL must start with wss:// (or ws:// for local dev)
settings.cert_pinning_description: Verify relay server certificates for extra security
settings.data_export_description: Download all your data in a portable format
settings.delete_account_description: Permanently delete your identity and all data
a11y.high_contrast_desc: Increase color contrast for better visibility
a11y.large_touch_targets_desc: Increase button and input sizes for easier interaction
help.title: Help
help.close_hint: Press Esc or q to close this help screen.
card.title: My Card
card.label: Label
visibility.title: Visibility Settings
visibility.what_can_see: What {name} can see of your card:
visibility.no_fields: No fields on your card yet. Add fields to manage visibility.
visibility.no_contacts: No contacts yet. Add contacts to manage visibility.
visibility.description: Control who sees your contact information
devices.title: Devices
devices.manage_description: Manage linked devices for this identity
devices.empty: No devices linked to this identity
devices.link_hint: Press [l] to generate a device link code
devices.multi_device_description: Link multiple devices to access your contacts from anywhere.
devices.sync_description: All devices share the same identity and stay in sync.
devices.link_instruction: Scan this code with your new device, or copy the data below:
devices.join_instruction: Paste the device link data from your other device:
devices.error_no_link_data: Please paste the device link data
devices.revoke_warning: This device will no longer be able to sync with your account.
recovery.title: Recovery
recovery.create_hint: Press [c] to create a recovery claim if needed
recovery.step1: Lost your device? Create a new identity on a new device
recovery.step2: Generate a recovery claim with your OLD public key
recovery.step3: Ask 3+ contacts to vouch for you in person
recovery.step4: Collect vouchers to prove you're the same person
recovery.step5: Share your recovery proof with all contacts
recovery.note: Note: Recovery requires mutual verification in person.
recovery.cli_hint: Use CLI for detailed recovery workflow: vauchi recovery --help
recovery.create_claim_description: Lost your device? Start the recovery process.
recovery.vouch_description: Help a contact recover their identity.
recovery.create_claim_instruction: Enter the public key from your lost identity:
recovery.vouch_instruction: Paste the recovery claim from your contact:
recovery.not_in_contacts_warning: This key is NOT in your contacts. Verify in person!
recovery.give_voucher_instruction: Give this to the person recovering:
recovery.error_no_old_key: Please enter your old public key
recovery.threshold_met: Threshold met! You can now recover your identity.
recovery.step1_desc: First, create a new identity on your new device.
recovery.step2_desc: Create a claim using your OLD public key from your lost identity.
recovery.step3_desc: Meet with 3+ trusted contacts in person. Have them vouch for your recovery.
recovery.step4_desc: Once you have enough vouchers, share your recovery proof with all contacts.
recovery.vouch_step1_desc: Meet your contact in person. Verify they are who they claim to be.
recovery.vouch_step2_desc: They will share their claim data with you.
recovery.vouch_step3_desc: Sign a voucher confirming their identity.
recovery.vouch_step4_desc: Give them the voucher data to add to their recovery proof.
recovery.identity_recovered: Your identity has been recovered! Your contacts will now trust your new identity.
recovery.collect_more_vouchers: Collect {remaining} more voucher(s) from trusted contacts.
recovery.share_proof_instruction: Share this proof with your contacts to restore your relationships.
recovery.need_more_vouchers: You need {remaining} more voucher(s). Meet with trusted contacts in person to collect them.
recovery.no_active_claim_description: You don't have an active recovery claim. Start a new recovery process if you need to recover a lost identity.
recovery.lost_device_description: You can recover your contact relationships through social vouching.
recovery.share_claim_instruction: Share this claim with your trusted contacts:
recovery.enter_old_key_instruction: Enter your OLD public key (from backup or previous device):
recovery.help_contact_recover_descriptio: If a contact lost their device, you can vouch for their identity.
recovery.vouch_warning: Only vouch for someone you can verify IN PERSON. This prevents identity theft.
recovery.give_voucher_to_contact: Give this voucher to your contact:
recovery.paste_claim_instruction: Paste the recovery claim data from your contact:
recovery.verify_in_person_warning: Verify this person's identity IN PERSON before vouching!
sync.title: Sync
sync.description: Synchronize your contact cards with the relay server.
backup.title: Backup & Restore
backup.description:
Back up your identity to transfer to another device or restore after reinstalling.
Your backup is encrypted with a password you choose.
backup.export: Export Backup - Create an encrypted backup
backup.import: Import Backup - Restore from a backup
backup.password_prompt: Enter a password to encrypt your backup (min 8 characters):
backup.import_prompt: Paste your backup data and enter the password used to create it:
backup.password_instruction: Enter a strong password to encrypt your backup.
backup.import_instruction: Paste your backup data and enter the password used to encrypt it.
backup.error_password_too_short: Password must be at least 8 characters
content.title: Content Updates
content.description: Update social networks, themes, and localization without app updates.
consent.title: Consent Settings
consent.description: Manage what data you share and with whom
consent.analytics_desc: Help improve Vauchi by sharing anonymous usage data
consent.crash_reports_desc: Automatically send crash reports to help fix bugs
account.title: Account
account.delete_description: Permanently delete your identity and all associated data
account.delete_warning: This action cannot be undone. All your contacts will be notified.
account.grace_period: You have {days} days to cancel the deletion
labels.title: Labels
delivery.title: Delivery Status
delivery.no_recent_message: Messages you send will appear here.
delivery.no_failed_message: All messages have been delivered successfully.
delivery.no_pending_message: No messages are waiting to be retried.
theme.title: Theme
language.title: Language
language.restart_required: Restart may be required for some changes
validation.invalid_email: Please enter a valid email address
validation.invalid_phone: Please enter a valid phone number
validation.invalid_hex: Please enter a valid hex string
privacy.export_description: Download all your data in a portable format
privacy.data_request_description: Request a copy of all your stored data
error.network: Network error. Please check your connection.
error.camera_unavailable: Camera not available on this device
devices.primary_description: This is the primary device. You can link additional devices to access your identity from multiple places.
devices.secondary_description: This device is linked to your primary identity.
devices.link_qr_description: Generate a QR code on this device for a new device to scan.
devices.unlink_message: This will remove "{name}" from your linked devices. The device will no longer have access to your identity.
devices.scan_qr_instruction: Scan this QR code on your new device
devices.open_vauchi_instruction: Open Vauchi on your new device and select "Join Existing Identity" to scan this code.
settings.cert_description: Certificate pinning ensures the app only connects to relay servers presenting a specific certificate, preventing man-in-the-middle attacks.
settings.cert_clear_warning: This will disable certificate pinning and allow connections to any valid relay server.
settings.cert_warning_cleared: Warning: Clearing the certificate will allow connections to any valid relay server.
settings.cert_paste_instruction: Paste a certificate in PEM format to enable pinning. This is typically provided by your organization's IT department.
settings.cert_pem_footer: Paste the certificate provided by your organization. It should begin with '-----BEGIN CERTIFICATE-----'.
settings.cert_pem_invalid: Invalid PEM format. Certificate must begin with '-----BEGIN CERTIFICATE-----' and end with '-----END CERTIFICATE-----'.
backup.auth_export_reason: Exporting your backup requires Face ID or Touch ID authentication to protect your identity.
backup.auth_import_reason: Importing a backup requires Face ID or Touch ID authentication to protect your identity.
backup.auth_biometric_export: Authenticate to export your identity backup
backup.auth_biometric_import: Authenticate to import your identity backup
backup.encrypt_footer: Your backup will be encrypted with this password. Store it safely - you'll need it to restore your identity.
backup.warning_replace: Warning: Importing a backup will replace your current identity!
backup.select_file_instruction: Select a backup file to restore your identity
backup.replace_warning: This will permanently replace your current identity. Make sure you have a backup of your current identity first.
content.footer: Updates include new social networks, localization improvements, and themes.
labels.no_labels_hint: No labels yet. Create one to organize your contacts!
labels.suggested_hint: Tap a suggestion to create it, or tap + to create your own.
labels.footer: Labels help you organize contacts into groups and control what information each group can see.
labels.delete_confirm_message: Are you sure you want to delete "{name}"? Contacts will remain in your contacts list but will lose this label's visibility settings.
labels.detail.name: Name
labels.detail.field_visibility_hint: Toggle which of your fields contacts in this label can see.
labels.detail.contacts_hint: To add or remove contacts, go to the contact's detail page and manage their labels.
labels.detail.delete_hint: Deleting this label will not remove the contacts from your contacts list.
labels.detail.label: Label
exchange.scan_instruction: Point camera at a Vauchi QR code
exchange.camera_permission_message: Please grant camera permission to scan QR codes
